title: Why no one wants to acknowledge that Heimerdinger is underpowered
body:
* He currently has the worst passive of all time
* His Q SHOULD scale with a new passive and be more meaningful during late game
* His W has a high cooldown and is basically only a damaging ability with no aditionnal effect. The only cool thing about that skill is the fact that it can activate thunderlord
* His E is a stun spell that has the LONGEST cooldown of all basic stun spells. On top of that, it only stuns for 1,25 second at all level, has a high mana cost at level 1 and is extremely hard to land from distance which makes Heimerdinger having the most unreliable stun of all mages.
* His R SHOULDN'T cost 100 mana upon activating it. If Heim wants to empower his Q, why not make it cast 100 mana when he casts his Q with his ult. He basically can waste all of his mana upon activating his ultimate on and off without doing anything.
* His turrets are sometime so stupid that they can actually miss an IMMOBILE target.
* Heimerdinger is one of the hardest mage to land his abilities. Coupled with HIGH cooldown spells and turrets charges, he can be completely useless during a period of time.
